column5: Anyone fish the Niagara River regularly?  Are there any salmon running yet?
Your going to need a intro to get better feedback ,than check it out yourself and report back before you will get much info.Good luck. All I will say it's fall, lol. We love reports and pictures.!!!!
All I will say is there is evidence of them being in the river washing up on shore daily. (this should answer your question)
